body:
Select PM.PlanMakinaID,P.MakinaID,PRMMK.UretimPartiID, UP.UretimPartiNo ,P.ProsesAdi, PM.PlanMakinaID,M2.MakinaNo,m2.MakinaID,PM.AddDate, UP.MakinaID UPMakinaID,PRMMK.MakinaID  PRMMKMakinaID  From  IT05_PartiRotaM PRM 
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM_MamulKumas PRMMK On PRMMK.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaD PRD On  PRD.UretimPartiID = PRMMK.UretimPartiID
INNER JOIN IT05_UretimPartileri UP On UP.UretimPartiID = PRMMK.UretimPartiID
INNER JOIN IT01_Prosesler P On P.ProsesID = PRD.ProsesID
INNER Join IT05_PlanMakina PM On PM.PlanID = PRD.PlanID
INNER JOIN IT01_Makinalar M2 On M2.MakinaID = PM.MakinaID
Where P.IsGantt = 0 And PM.MakinaID
In (SELECT M.MakinaID FROM  IT01_MakinaProses MP
INNER JOIN  IT01_Prosesler P On P.ProsesID = MP.ProsesID
INNER JOIN  IT01_Makinalar M On M.MakinaID = MP.MakinaID
Where P.IsGantt  =1)

--59
Update PRMMK 
Set PRMMK.MakinaID = P.MakinaID,
PRMMK.IsITUpdate = PRMMK.IsITUpdate
From IT05_PlanMakina PM
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaD PRD On PRD.PlanID = PM.PlanID
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM_MamulKumas PRMMK On PRMMK.UretimPartiID = PRD.UretimPartiID
INNER JOIN IT01_Prosesler P On P.ProsesID = PRD.ProsesID
INNER JOIN IT05_UretimPartileri UP On UP.UretimPartiID = PRD.UretimPartiID
Where PM.PlanMakinaID IN
(
94899,
94907,
94915,
94923,
94931,
94939,
94947,
94955,
94963,
94971,
94979,
94987,
94995,
95003,
95011,
95019,
95027,
95035,
95043,
95051,
95059,
95067,
95075,
95083,
95091,
95099,
95107,
95115,
95123,
95131,

95147,

95187,
95701,

102560,
102641,
102655,
102669
)
